about_the_game:
The evil King Caries,

leader of the tooth trolls has kidnapped the tooth fairy! A small tooth must venture forth and rescue her.


Walk, Run, Jump, Eat, Swing and Shoot Tooth Paste through Caries Forest, Caries Town and King Caries Lair while listening to some Really Catchy Tunes!












  • A Super Toothy, 2D, Musically Induced, Action, with a little Adventure, Platformer Game, Inspired by Retro Classics from Before.


  • 12 Action Packed Levels


  • All Kinds of Hand Animated 2D Sprite Characters, Ranging From Peter Pizzas to Surly Sausages


  • Jump and Eat Those Foods to Survive(what are you gonna do? A tooth has to eat...)


  • Use the Tooth Paste and Floss Whip to Help You Traverse the Dangerous Lands of King Caries


  • Pimp Your Tooth, Find Items Throughout the Game to Make Your Tooth Look "Kewl"


  • All Original Orchestral and Chip-Tune Soundtrack by Max Robert: "Where Video Game Blipp Blopp Chip-Tune Meets Orchestra."


Defeat King Caries!

Save the Tooth Fairy!
detailed_description:
The evil King Caries,

leader of the tooth trolls has kidnapped the tooth fairy! A small tooth must venture forth and rescue her.


Walk, Run, Jump, Eat, Swing and Shoot Tooth Paste through Caries Forest, Caries Town and King Caries Lair while listening to some Really Catchy Tunes!












  • A Super Toothy, 2D, Musically Induced, Action, with a little Adventure, Platformer Game, Inspired by Retro Classics from Before.


  • 12 Action Packed Levels


  • All Kinds of Hand Animated 2D Sprite Characters, Ranging From Peter Pizzas to Surly Sausages


  • Jump and Eat Those Foods to Survive(what are you gonna do? A tooth has to eat...)


  • Use the Tooth Paste and Floss Whip to Help You Traverse the Dangerous Lands of King Caries

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Processor: Core i3
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL 3.3 capable graphics card

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: OS X 10.11
  • Processor: Core i3
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL 3.3 capable graphics card
  • Storage: 500 MB available space

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: win 10
  • Processor: intel i3 processor
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL 3.3 capable graphics card
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: win 10
  • Processor: intel i5
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL 3.3 capable graphics card
  • Storage: 500 MB available space

short_description: The evil King Caries, leader of the tooth trolls has kidnapped the tooth fairy and it is up to a small tooth to save her!
